title: Metoro-Mcp-Server
description: Metoro MCP Server enables interaction between Kubernetes clusters and the Claude Desktop App using the Model Context Protocol.
creator: metoro-io

commandInfo.command: <your path to Metoro MCP server go executable>/metoro-mcp-server

METORO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Authentication token from your Metoro account or demo token for live cluster access.

METORO_API_URL.description: The API URL to either your Metoro account or the demo cluster URL.
